DOC.brief_title: Crossover Study Investigate Safety , Tolerability , Pharmacokinetics Repeat Dose Zanamivir/Placebo Via Devices Administered Twice Daily 5 Days
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study compare safety tolerability Zanamivir use Rotahaler placebo within Rotahaler presentation Diskhaler . Eighteen subject receive three treatment 5 day 3-way crossover design .
